# Package "maratest" for Calculating mean values for each virus and each day

This package serves to generate mean values of viral titers from different, independent experiments from an excel file.

What this package does:
1) group different lines and columns (as specified)
2) generate mean values per day and virus


#Installation
##CRAN
```{r} 
install.packages("maratest")
```

```{r}
library("maratest")
````


##Github


#Necessary packages
- dplyr
- magrittr
